mean_en: used to express good wishes in the evening especially when someone is leaving or going to sleep
word_etyma: good 好的 + night 晚上 → int. 晚安；再见
short_phrase: say "goodnight" before we go to sleep
sentence: I miss when my mother would tell me "goodnight" at bedtime.
sentence_trans: 我怀念睡前妈妈对我说“晚安”。
